original_text: You will not die until you are old. You will grow with strength until you die, like crops that grow until the time of harvest. You will not die until you are old.
korean_text: 네가 장수하다가 무덤에 이르리니 마치 곡식단을 제 때에 들어올림 같으니라

sentences.original_text: You will not die until you are old
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 늙을 때까지 죽지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: You will grow with strength until you die
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 죽을 때까지 힘을 얻으며 성장할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: like crops that grow until the time of harvest
You will not die until you are old
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 늙을 때까지 죽지 않을 것입니다
